duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage entity management systems, subsidiary corporate governance, and corporate transactional matters.
Liaise with multiple departments to ensure legal compliance and coordination.
Assume responsibility for data management and CT notary duties as required.
Utilize computer skills for various legal documentation and processes.
Communicate effectively, manage time efficiently, and pay attention to detail in all tasks.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Paralegal Studies or related field (preferred)
